DRINKS.name: Psycho
DRINKS.directions: Quick shake all ingredients except foaming bitters and strain into tin. Add foaming bitters and long hard dry shake. Pour into coupe glass.

DRINKS.name: Candy
DRINKS.directions: Squeeze orange wedge and hard shake all ingredients over ice. Strain into a rocks glass and serve neat.

DRINKS.name: Blair Witch Project
DRINKS.garnish: Garnish: skewered cherry and orange peel
DRINKS.directions: Stir all ingredients over ice, then strain into rocks glass over ice. Express the orange peel over the drink.

DRINKS.name: It
DRINKS.directions: Shake ingredients quick and hard, then strain into rocks glass. Finish with a float Blackjack.

DRINKS.name: Hell Raiser
DRINKS.directions: Shake all ingredients over ice and strain back into tin.  Dry shake with foaming bitters, then strain into Nick & Nora glass.

DRINKS.name: Impeachment
DRINKS.directions: Shake ingredients quick and hard, then strain into a Collins glass over ice. Top with tonic water.

DRINKS.name: Flytown Mule
DRINKS.directions: Build cocktail in mead glass. Add ice and top with ginger beer.

DRINKS.name: Wild Sweet Annie
DRINKS.directions: Build cocktail in rocks glass. Add light ice (4 cubes) and swirl. Squeeze and drop lemon wedge into glass.

DRINKS.name: Meadhattan
DRINKS.directions: Stir all ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the cherry.

DRINKS.name: Ohio Gold
DRINKS.directions: Hard shake over ice, then strain into rocks glass. Express orange peel over the drink, drop into glass, and top with ginger beer.

DRINKS.name: Battle Me
DRINKS.directions: Stir all ingredients over ice, then strain into a rocks glass. Express lemon over the drink, and drop into glass.

DRINKS.name: The Square
DRINKS.directions: Shake all ingredients over ice, then strain into a Collins glass over ice. Garnish with Tajín lime wheel.

DRINKS.name: Chad's Mom
DRINKS.directions: Muddle orange, cherry, and bitters in rocks glass. Add other ingredients and stir over light ice. Top with a splash of soda water.

DRINKS.name: The Family Jules
DRINKS.directions: Ask Julian to make it for you I guess.

DRINKS.name: Meadarita
DRINKS.directions: Shake al ingredients over ice, then strain into glass. Drop half a lime into glass and garnish with orange peel. Optionally add salt rim.

DRINKS.name: Dancing Ricky
DRINKS.directions: Build in highball glass full of ice. Top with soda water and garnish with lime wedge.

DRINKS.name: Grapefruit Moon
DRINKS.directions: Muddle sage and simple syrup in tin. Add all other ingredients and shake well over ice. Strain into tall martini glass with a fine mesh, then garnish with one sage sprig.

DRINKS.name: New Fashioned
DRINKS.directions: Muddle orange, sugar, and grapfruit bitters in tin. Add all other ingredients and stir over light ice. Strain into rocks glass.

DRINKS.name: Theophany
DRINKS.directions: Swirl all ingredients in tin, using frozen grapes as replacement for ice. Pour all contents into a chilled martini glass, then garnish with rosemary.

DRINKS.name: Gindecent Exposure
DRINKS.directions: Shake all ingredients over ice.

DRINKS.name: Grover Cleveland
DRINKS.directions: Lightly shake all ingredients over ice.

DRINKS.name: Habanero Hebdo
DRINKS.directions: Roll all ingredients with ice.

DRINKS.name: O-Y-What
DRINKS.directions: Shake all ingredients over ice.

DRINKS.name: Temperance Sour
DRINKS.directions: Dry shake all ingredients, the lightly shake over ice. Strain into a rocks glass and garnish with lemon peel.

DRINKS.name: Spanky's Hot Mid WEstern Buckeye Basil Express
DRINKS.directions: Slap basil 2-3 times, then muddle in tin with jalapeños, orange zest, and agave nectar. Add other ingredients and shake like hell with heavy ice. Strain into martini glass.

DRINKS.name: Sam's Jaguar
DRINKS.directions: Stir all ingredients over ice, then strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

DRINKS.name: Kelley's Island
DRINKS.directions: Pour the cola into a pint glass. Short shake the remaining ingredients with ice for about 5 seconds, then strain into the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes and garnish with the lemon wheel.

DRINKS.name: Salty Caramel
DRINKS.directions: Hard shake all ingredients 3 times, strain into chilled rocks glass, and sprinkle salt over drink.

DRINKS.name: Appletini
DRINKS.directions: Shake all ingredients over ice, quick and hard. Strain into chilled glass and float apple slice on top of drink.

DRINKS.name: Lemon Drop
DRINKS.directions: Makes 2 shots. Shake hard and quick over ice, avoiding diulation. Strain into shot glasses.

DRINKS.name: Great Balls of Fire
DRINKS.directions: Makes 2 shots. Shake hard over ice, then strain into shot glasses.

DRINKS.name: Uppercut
DRINKS.directions: Stir over large scoop of ice, then strain into martini glass. Garnish with orange twist.

DRINKS.name: Courtland
DRINKS.directions: Combine ingredients in mead glass. Lightly swirl and serve neat.

DRINKS.name: Trust Fall
DRINKS.directions: Shake all ingredients over ice gently, then strain into rocks glass. Sprink coffee over top of drink.

DRINKS.name: My Winter Honey
DRINKS.directions: Add all ingredients to glass, and swirl. Add a small amount of ice, then sprinkle cinnamon on top of drink.

DRINKS.name: Local Vesper
DRINKS.directions: Muddle orange in bitters in tin, then add all other ingredients. Shake hard and strain into martini glass.

DRINKS.name: Matcha Sour
DRINKS.directions: Shake all ingredients over ice, then strain into rocks glass. Garnish with lime wedge and mint leaf.

DRINKS.name: Beetween the Sheets
DRINKS.directions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish.
